name: Qucusaurus Warrior: Heartstar Hammer
description:
A powerful warrior from the clifftops, whose bravery has been acknowledged and for which they may wear the Saurian Crown.
Even in Natlan, the Nation of Pyro, members of the Flower-Feather Clan have a unique approach when it comes to wielding fire and flames. For these tribal warriors, armed as they are with heavy hammers, flames are something that burst forth from violent collisions, symbols of intense passion. When they do battle, the fight usually ends within an instantâ€” and they are always the ones who stand victorious.

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.
